name: Reef/Semi Deep Blue Spearfishing
description:
When you think that you are a real, experienced spearo who does not mind getting up at 5am, then the reef / semi deep blue spearfishing trip in Playa del Carmen Mexico Mexico is the right choice. You love to hunt for that specific big fish and if you have to freedive deep for it, you'll do it! Just like you, we love spearfishing! SpearfishingToday is the original and best spearfishing charter in Playa del Carmen.

Your guide Diego (Biologist, FII certified, English and Spanish speaking) is motivated to guide you through our secret spots to get you your trophy fish. Spearfishing in Playa del Carmen is for true hunters. What fish are you thinking of? Permit, Mahi Mahi, Amberjack, Grouper, Barracuda, Wahoo, Snapper, Tuna, Triggerfish, Mackerel? Yes, you can bring your own gear or use ours! We accept cancellations up to 48 hours before your scheduled trip for a full refund.
